proof_script:
lemma (in Fac_impl) shows "\<forall>n. \<Gamma>\<turnstile> \<lbrace>\<acute>N = n\<rbrace> \<acute>R :== PROC Fac(\<acute>N) \<lbrace>\<acute>R = fac n\<rbrace>"
apply (hoare_rule HoarePartial.ProcRec1)
apply vcg_step
apply vcg_step
apply vcg_step
apply vcg_step
apply vcg_step
apply simp
done
